keyMoments.title: Eric Reveals His Betrayal
keyMoments.description: Eric openly declares to Commodore Nelson that he never intended to help him obtain the dragon bone elixir, revealing his plan to use Nelson's resources for his own gain.
keyMoments.significance: Major character reveal showing Eric's true villainous nature and complete selfishness.
keyMoments.quote: Did you really think I would share the elixir of immortality with you? I only needed your fleet to catch the dragon!

keyMoments.title: Eric vs. Zoro Combat
keyMoments.description: Eric engages Roronoa Zoro in direct combat, using his Kama Kama no Mi abilities to gain the upper hand.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Eric's combat prowess and establishes him as a credible threat to even skilled fighters like Zoro.
keyMoments.quote: The wind I create is as sharp as a Meito. Tearing a person limb from limb is child's play!

keyMoments.title: Uses Kama Kama no Tsumujikaze
keyMoments.description: Eric unleashes his signature wind-slash technique in combat, showing the full power of his Devil Fruit abilities.
keyMoments.significance: First use of Eric's most powerful attack, demonstrating the Kama Kama no Mi's devastating offensive capabilities.

abilities.description: Eric releases multiple razor-sharp air blades in an X-formation pattern using his elongated nails.

relationships.description: Eric betrays Nelson, revealing he only used the Commodore's resources to capture the dragon for himself.

evolutionMoments.description: Eric openly declares his betrayal, turning against his former employer.

relationships.description: Eric fights against Zoro, using his Devil Fruit abilities to gain an advantage.

evolutionMoments.description: Eric and Zoro engage in direct combat.

reveals.information: Eric's true goal is to obtain the dragon bone elixir for himself, not to share it with Nelson
Can use Kama Kama no Tsumujikaze technique

name.japanese: ネルソン・ロワイヤル

keyMoments.title: Nelson Executes Crane Wing Formation
keyMoments.description: Nelson's fleet successfully surrounds the Going Merry using a strategic naval formation, trapping the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nelson's tactical military capabilities despite his physical limitations.
keyMoments.quote: You're completely surrounded! There's no escape now, Straw Hat!

keyMoments.title: Orders Fire on His Own Men
keyMoments.description: In a fit of rage after Eric's betrayal, Nelson orders all his ships to fire on Eric's escape boat despite three of his own Marines being aboard.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Nelson's complete moral corruption and callous disregard for the lives of his subordinates, establishing him as a despicable villain.
keyMoments.quote: All ships, open fire! I don't care if my own men are on that boat!

relationships.description: After Eric's betrayal, Nelson becomes enraged and orders his fleet to kill the mercenary.

evolutionMoments.description: Eric betrays Nelson, turning their employer-mercenary relationship into open hostility.

reveals.information: Nelson has no regard for the lives of his own men, willing to sacrifice them for revenge

keyMoments.title: Apis's Emotional Plea to Ryu
keyMoments.description: Apis cries out in anguish as she watches Ryu sacrifice himself to protect her and the Straw Hats, desperately trying to communicate with him using her Hiso Hiso no Mi ability.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the deep emotional bond between Apis and the ancient dragon, highlighting the theme of friendship and sacrifice.
keyMoments.quote: Ryu, please! You don't have to do this!

relationships.description: Apis has a deep emotional bond with the ancient dragon Ryu, communicating with him through her Devil Fruit ability and caring deeply for his wellbeing.

evolutionMoments.description: Apis's bond with Ryu is highlighted as she watches him sacrifice himself to protect her.

keyMoments.title: Ryu's Heroic Sacrifice
keyMoments.description: Despite being weak and injured, Ryu intervenes to protect Apis and the Straw Hat crew from Eric and Nelson's fleet, putting himself in mortal danger.
keyMoments.significance: Emotional climax showing the dragon's noble nature and deep bond with Apis. Demonstrates selfless sacrifice in contrast to the villains' selfishness.

relationships.description: Ryu has formed a deep bond with Apis, who can communicate with him through her Devil Fruit ability. He is willing to sacrifice himself to protect her.

evolutionMoments.description: Ryu demonstrates the depth of his bond with Apis by sacrificing himself to ensure her safety.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Deflects Cannonballs
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses his Gomu Gomu no Mi powers to deflect incoming cannonballs from Nelson's fleet back at the Marine ships, protecting the Going Merry.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's tactical use of his Devil Fruit powers and his ability to protect his crew in naval combat.

keyMoments.title: Zoro vs. Eric Combat
keyMoments.description: Zoro engages mercenary Eric in combat, but struggles against Eric's Kama Kama no Mi wind-slash abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even Zoro can be challenged by opponents with unique Devil Fruit abilities, establishing Eric as a credible threat.

relationships.description: Zoro fights against Eric, who uses his Devil Fruit abilities to gain an advantage.

evolutionMoments.description: Zoro and Eric engage in combat.
